name: Fury of the Weald
description:
You are not alone. The silent solitude of the weald has been interrupted by humans, once again. You, the forest's guardian spirit, must roust these insolent pests and destroy their vile machines. Cleanse the land of the humans' waste, and show no mercy as you invoke the wrath of Mother Nature.

---

This game is a submission for the Brackeys Jam 2022.2! Credits are as follows:

Codebolt - Programming, Design

Sophie Martin - Music Composition

Autumn Moulios - Sound Design, Audio Programming

Jessica Wake - Art, Design

Enrico Widodo - Programming, Design

Herman Wu - Programming, Design, Producer
